1. This app pulls starred contacts data from the Contacts app. So, first of all, have the contacts stored on this phone. The best way is to store your contacts on Google Contacts, use that Google Account on this phone, and auto-sync the contacts. 
 2. In the contacts app or in Google Contacts Website, upload and store the contact's photo. It is must to have person's photo on the contacts for this app. Please make sure the image is cropped to cover just the headshot. 
 3. Similarly, store the primary contact number under 'Mobile' label.(Not 'Home') 
 4. Store the contact number for Google Voice under 'Google Voice' label. 
 5. Store the contact number for Viber, choose Custom label and create 'Viber' label. 
 6. Under IM section, add a label 'Facebook' and store the facebook username of the contact person. 
 7. Most importantly, mark those contacts you want to appear in this app as STARRED, which means to mark them as Favorites in your Contacts app or in Google Contacts website if you are using auto-sync. 
 8. That's all.

1. Permission to read contacts should be granted. \n 2. For the first time, when clicking Phone icon and Messenger icon, you might be asked which app to choose saying \'Complete action using\'. For Phone icon, select Phone app and click \'ALWAYS\'. For Messenger icon, select Facebook Messenger app and click \'ALWAYS\'.\n 3. Long click the location icon to send the current location via SMS to the selected contact\'s \'Mobile\' number. The location should be turned on and permission to use location and sending SMS should be granted.
